description: Enhancing Rural Income and Livelihoods through Sustainable Agricultural Development and Micro-enterprise in Bhutan

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The project aims at reducing poverty in the targeted poor villages under Mongar and Zhemgang Dzongkhags through improved agricultural productivity, enhanced access to markets, credit and extension services.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Enhancing Rural Livelihoods

title: Enhancing Rural Incomes and Livelihoods (PTTF)
